content:
I'd be happy to help you organize your movie collection!

Congrats on getting the Blu-ray of Avengers: Endgame! It's an epic movie, and I'm sure you'll enjoy rewatching it. Now, let's get started on organizing your movie collection!

To help me better understand your collection, can you please tell me:

1. What type of movie formats do you have (e.g., Blu-ray, DVD, 4K Ultra HD, VHS, digital copies)?
2. How many movies do you have in your collection?
3. Do you have any specific categories or genres you'd like to organize by (e.g., action, comedy, drama, horror, Marvel movies, etc.)?
4. Do you have a preferred way of organizing your movies (e.g., alphabetically, by release year, by franchise, etc.)?
5. Do you have any existing organizational systems or storage solutions in place (e.g., shelves, binders, cases)?

Feel free to share any additional details about your collection, and I'll do my best to help you get everything organized and tidy!
